attributes.action: get an indoor skatepark in wokingham.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, my friends and I, have reaserched about our idea and belive it too be a valid point.
In wokingham we have one small skatepark, which our local council wish too shut because of complaints from nearby houses.
We have thought about this fully for a while and gatherd our points. There is an unused warehouse in the local area, in an industrial estate and there are no other houses near by and only one other warehouse.
This idea will make money and employ local people. Unfortunatly it will cost a large amount of money too build, but will gain all of the expences back and most likely more.
This will take youths off the streets cutting anti-social behavior and crime.
Thank you for reading our petition, please sign and help us enjoy our hobby again.
